EmailTemplate.subject: Haven't signed up to HeadStart yet? Don't miss out!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
One week left to apply to HeadStart!
Applications close midnight THIS SUNDAY 24th JULY!
Why not make a positive difference in your community... While gaining skills and experience to help you get ahead?
HeadStart is an exclusive programme designed for NCS with The Challenge graduates!
SIGN UP HERE: https://www.headstart-thechallenge.org/confirm-email/
If you experience an error code while applying, or at any stage of the application process, please contact our call centre so we can help you out as soon as possible! HeadStart Call Centre: 020 3793 7327
Note: You have to be 16 or over to take part in HeadStart. If you are 15 and want to take part in HeadStart, you still can!
If you turn 16 on or before 7th August: use the above link when you turn 16! If you turn 16 after 7th August: you can start HeadStart in October, with Cohort 2. You'll get an email closer to the time letting you know that you can apply!
Any questions? Email us at headstart@the-challenge.org
Want to get in on the conversation? Join our brand new national social media channels to see what's going on in HeadStart around the country!
